nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592

Class NewGameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.basemodel.HangManActivity
        • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.NewGameActivity

  • public class NewGameActivity
extends HangManActivity
    This class handles the game flow of the Gameplay. It is the first entry point for the player when he starts the application and it will handle all initial setup in order for the player to commence playing
    Since:
    2015

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String dictionaryFile
      The filename of the dictionary file
      protected TextView displayWord
      The word that will be displayed on the screen for the user to play.

      The feedback to the user based on the last results
      protected Figure figure
      The Figure that will be displayed during this game
      protected boolean gameComplete
      Flag set when the game is complete

      The gameplay instance
      protected History history
      Contains the History instance of this game

      Contains the preferences for this game
      protected DictionaryReader reader
      Contains the reader that the Dictionary can work with
      protected boolean resetFigureStages
      Flag set when the number of stages of the figure should be altered
      protected boolean resetWordLength
      Flag set when the desired word length should be reset
      protected SurfaceHolder surfaceHolder
      This contains the SurfaceHolder instance where the Figure can draw on
